title: Why is my Android phone not detecting music recently added? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think you might have rooted the mobile and done some residual cleaning with some apps like Greenify, Android maid, Clean Master root privilege version.so these apps causes residuals to get cleaned and the apps might not get the data from the R/W mount internal storage or the External storage, all you you have to do is, you should either store factory settings or flash a new ROM.

The Filedrop and Maxthon applications must be missing mediascanner code to scan the incoming files. This scanner indexes the files based on file type. When you restart the phone, mediascanner is automatically triggered and entire SD card is scanned.
